name: Defenders: Survival and Tower Defense
description:
Defenders: Survival and Tower Defense is a Cooperative First Person Shooter that redefines the tower defense genre. Team up with friends, drop in to a variety of diverse maps, and defend The Core from waves of hostiles! Destroy enemies by utilizing a wide variety of unique weapons, from lava guns to laser guns! Bolster your defenses by building towers and collect materials to craft and upgrade them! Join the fight and become a DEFENDER!

Features

  • Cooperative multiplayer or solo, up to 4 players
  • Engaging first person combat
  • 6+ Diverse map locations
  • 9+ Unique & upgradable weapons
  • 8+ Towers to build & upgrade
  • Visual weapon upgrades
  • Tower Building/Upgrading/Selling System
  • Dynamic Enemy AI
  • Achievements

Feedback

We want to involve the community in our development of Defenders: Survival and Tower Defense to ensure that the product has the best quality possible. If you have any feedback, suggestions, or recommendations, don't hesitate to reach out to us.
